items.title: Real-time Task Updates
items.description: Enable team members to see task changes instantly across all devices.
acceptance_criteria: When a user updates a task, all other team members see the change within 2 seconds.
Task status, assignee, and due date changes are reflected without requiring a page refresh.
non_functional: System latency for updates must be under 2 seconds for 95% of requests.
Support at least 100 concurrent active users without performance degradation.

items.title: Team Chat Integration
items.description: Provide an in-app chat feature for team members to communicate about tasks.
acceptance_criteria: Users can send and receive messages in real-time within a team chat room.
Messages are stored and retrievable for at least 90 days.
non_functional: Chat latency must be under 1 second for message delivery.
Ensure chat data is encrypted in transit and at rest.

notes: Assumed that 'team collaboration features' include real-time task updates and integrated chat. Further clarification needed on additional collaboration tools like file sharing or video conferencing.
